message: I propose we divide the $10000 with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution while acknowledging the higher risk for Alice due to inflation.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to accept a smaller risk
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the $10000. This aims to balance the risk for both of us and ensure fairness in the distribution.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'll give you a higher absolute amount to make up for the inflation
